alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 6:32AM EST until January 04 at 11:34AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...Until late this morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.5 feet, Sang Branch Road is under water at Red Lick Creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 21.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:15 AM EST Tuesday was 29.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 13.5 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 21.6 feet on 04/03/2005. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued 11 AM EST.
